author: ferencek
body:
Backport from #13115 of a fix for the problem with the jet correction factors in PATJetUpdater reported in https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/jes/574.html This PR complements #12890.

This PR has no impact on the standard RECO or the MiniAOD production.
title: JEC fix in the PATJetUpdater (76X backport)
